metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8396 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow in H5O__layout_encode in H5Olayout.c in the HDF HDF5 through 1.10.4 library allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HDF5 file. This issue was triggered while repacking an HDF5 file, aka "Invalid write of size 2."

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
